18213098.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

repnme.cdata!:
Thailand - Second Structural Adjustment
            Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Loan
            Project will be the second to support the implementation of
            the Government's comprehensive structural adjustment
            program, this phase of which has been outlined in a Letter
            of Development Policy submitted to the Bank. The principal
            aim of the program is to restore a sustainable medium-term
            balance of payments position while maintaining the growth
            momentum of the economy. To achieve these objectives,
            specific action will be taken over the next twelve months
            to: (i) promote a coordinated approach in strengthening
            public sector resource mobilization and efficiency of
            resource use; (ii) increase the effectiveness of public
            institutions guiding the structural adjustment process;
            (iii) improve the structure of industrial incentives; (iv)
            improve the efficiency of energy use; and (v) promote
            agricultural growth and exports. The foreign exchange
            provided by the loan will be used to finance essential imports.
